section.heading: Transfer of certain board of education administrative employees' to school clerical services of the board of education of the city of New...

content.p:
ยง 2575-a. Transfer of certain board of education administrative
employees' to school clerical services of the board of education of the
city of New York. Notwithstanding any other provision of this law to
the contrary, any employee who has completed at least twenty years of
continuous board of education administrative service, or other service
as a member of the board of education retirement system, and having
accepted appointment to the school clerical or pedagogical service of
the board of education of the city of New York, may continue membership
in the board of education retirement system and shall be permitted to
contribute to such system and receive credit for services rendered to
the school clerical or pedagogical service of the board of education of
the city of New York as if such service was education service.
